item.title: 拉加德承诺欧洲央行将对人工智能引发的裁员保持"高度关注"
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，该行将密切关注经济领域全面采用人工智能是否引发失业的任何迹象。【原文：The European Central Bank will closely monitor for any signs that the adoption of artificial intelligence throughout the economy is sparking job losses, President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉人对经济前景持更乐观态度，因美国干预
item.description: 随着美国放松制裁以及政府推出吸引投资的改革措施，大多数委内瑞拉人预计经济和就业市场将在六个月内好转。【原文：Most Venezuelans expect the economy and job market to improve within six months as the US eases sanctions and the government rolls out reforms to attract investment.】

item.title: 谢恩鲍姆支持率在2月民调中跌至56%的新低
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆的支持率在2月份跌至56%，较1月份下降近7个百分点，创下这位左翼领导人执政以来的新低。【原文：The approval rating of Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum dipped to 56% in February, down nearly seven points since January and marking a fresh low for the leftist leader.】

item.title: Summit Partners向网络销售初创公司Stay22注资1.22亿美元
item.description: 私募股权公司Summit Partners将向蒙特利尔初创企业Stay22 Technologies Inc.投资1.22亿美元。该公司提供技术解决方案，帮助出版商和创作者通过在线销售获利。【原文：Private equity firm Summit Partners is investing $122 million in Montreal’s Stay22 Technologies Inc., a startup that offers technology to help publishers and creators earn money from online sales.】

item.title: 微软日本负责人强调配合反垄断调查
item.description: 微软日本公司负责人表示，该公司正配合日本反垄断监管机构的调查，此前微软因Azure云服务涉嫌反竞争行为而受到调查。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is compliant with Japan’s antitrust watchdog and its inquiry, the chief of its local unit said, as the company fields an investigation over possible anti-competitive practices involving the Azure cloud services.】

item.title: 标普警示印尼评级风险，数周前穆迪已发出警告
item.description: 标普全球评级警告称，不断加剧的财政压力——尤其是更高的债务偿还成本——正增加印尼主权信用状况的下行风险，可能导致评级下调。【原文：S&P Global Ratings warned that rising fiscal pressures, particularly higher debt-servicing costs, are increasing downside risks for Indonesia’s sovereign credit profile and could lead to negative rating action.】

item.title: 阿布扎比将加入新兴市场债券热潮 计划发行美元债券
item.description: 阿布扎比即将发行两笔基准规模的美元债券，这是该地区今年首次进军债务市场。【原文：Abu Dhabi is set to issue two benchmark-sized dollar bonds, in its first foray into debt markets of the year.】

item.title: 日银总裁称美日投资融资仍需努力
item.description: 据参与谈判的东京支持银行负责人透露，美日两国仍需就作为美日贸易协议组成部分而宣布的三个项目敲定资金细节，这方面工作尚有大量待完成。【原文：The US and Japan still need to do a lot of work to hammer the funding details for three projects announced as part of a US-Japan trade deal, according to the head of a Tokyo-backed bank involved in the negotiations.】

item.title: 英德拉订单激增至160亿欧元，股价创历史新高
item.description: 西班牙防务与信息技术服务公司英德拉系统公司（Indra Sistemas SA）股价飙升至历史新高，此前该公司公布的财报超出预期，且其订单积压量已翻倍增长。【原文：Indra Sistemas SA soared to a record after the Spanish defense and IT services firm reported earnings that beat expectations and said its order backlog had more than doubled.】

item.title: 马拉松公司理查兹担忧直接贷款软件违约率达15%
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司董事长布鲁斯·理查兹指出，私募信贷对软件行业的风险敞口过大，但对更广泛市场的传染风险较小。【原文：Private credit is way too exposed to the software industry, according to Marathon Asset Management LP Chairman Bruce Richards, but there is little risk of contagion to the wider market.】

item.title: 卢特尼克与印度戈亚尔会晤，美中关税诉讼遭遇挫折
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克周四会见了印度商业和贸易部长皮尤什·戈亚尔。此前数日，美国最高法院推翻了特朗普总统实施的全球性关税政策，此举表明双边协议仍将按计划推进。【原文：US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick met India’s Commerce and Trade Minister Piyush Goyal on Thursday, days after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs, signaling that the bilateral deal remains on track.】

item.title: 百度营收连续三个季度下滑，人工智能业务发展滞后
item.description: 百度公司连续第三个季度营收下滑，凸显其核心广告业务和人工智能业务的疲软程度。【原文：Baidu Inc. reported a drop in its revenue for the third consecutive quarter, underscoring the magnitude of weakness in its core advertising and AI businesses.】

item.title: 追逐收益使新兴市场债券对美国国债的敏感度降低
item.description: 新兴市场本地货币债券对美国国债波动的敏感度正在降低，因投资者更关注其收益率优势。【原文：Emerging-market local-currency bonds are becoming less sensitive to swings in US Treasuries as investors focus more on yield advantage.】

item.title: 保险成本如何导致纽约市建筑成本居高不下
item.description:

item.title: 零散股：保险如何推高纽约市建筑成本（播客）
item.description: 只要纽约市的建设成本居高不下，就很难想象这座城市会变得更实惠。无论是新建住房还是交通设施，纽约的施工成本都闻名遐迩。据报道，地铁站每座电梯造价高达1亿美元，公共厕所的建设成本同样动辄数百万美元。成本飙升的推手之一是保险——这虽是全国性难题，但在纽约尤为严峻，其成本占项目总成本的比例高达...【原文：It’s hard to imagine New York City becoming significantly more affordable as long as it remains so expensive to build things. Whether we’re talking about new housing or transportation, the city is a famously expensive place to do construction. There are reports of subway elevators costing $100 million per station. Public bathrooms end up costing millions as well. One driver of costs is insurance, which is a major national issue, but particularly acute in NYC, with costs as a share of a given con】

item.title: GCQ斥资2亿澳元买入软件股，押注抛售潮已结束
item.description: 悉尼对冲基金GCQ基金管理公司表示，软件股抛售已触底，趁势买入约2亿澳元（1.43亿美元）的科技股，这些股票此前在下跌趋势中遭受重创。【原文：Sydney-based hedge fund GCQ Funds Management said the bottom is in for the software selloff, snapping up about A$200 million ($143 million) worth of tech stocks caught in the downdraft.】

item.title: 贝莱德称日本债券收益率达6%，且受益于汇率提振
item.description: 据贝莱德公司称，日本国债可为愿意押注长期债务的美元投资者提供约6%的收益率，该公司将当前环境称为投资的"黄金时代"。【原文：Japan’s sovereign bonds can offer yields of around 6% for dollar-based investors willing to take a bet on long-dated debt, according to BlackRock Inc., which dubbed the current backdrop a “golden age” for investing.】

item.title: 阿波罗与法国巴黎银行接近达成欧洲私募信贷合作协议
item.description: 知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司与法国巴黎银行正接近达成协议，将在欧洲私募信贷市场建立合作关系。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and BNP Paribas SA are nearing a deal to partner up in Europe’s private credit market, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 外资交易助力肯尼亚先令逆势而上，抵御新兴市场货币波动
item.description: 肯尼亚先令对美元汇率在过去18个月内维持在异常窄幅区间内波动，在经历2023年惨痛暴跌后，已成为全球最稳定的货币之一。【原文：Kenya’s shilling has traded in an unusually narrow band against the dollar for 18 months, emerging as one of the world’s most stable currencies after a bruising 2023 rout.】

item.title: 贝利发起新的金融稳定委员会提案，旨在推动跨境支付工作
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁·贝利发起新一轮行动，旨在促进传统货币跨境流动。此前官员们承认，各国"不太可能"实现2027年设定的目标。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey launched a fresh bid to smooth the flow of traditional money across national borders after officials acknowledged it’s “unlikely” countries will meet goals set for 2027.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行必须持续关注通胀预期
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德重申，欧洲央行已成功控制了消费价格，同时提醒政策制定者必须密切关注民众对通胀的高度敏感。【原文：President Christine Lagarde repeated that the European Central Bank has succeeded in taming consumer prices, while cautioning that policymakers must keep an eye on elevated perceptions of inflation.】

item.title: 香港顶级开发商利润随市场复苏而增长
item.description: 香港最大地产商上半年录得盈利增长，这再次表明该市房地产市场正在复苏。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest property developer recorded growth in first-half profit, in another sign of the city’s real estate recovery.】

item.title: 顶级银行错失李氏集团以140亿美元将英国电力资产出售给Engie集团的交易
item.description: 香港富豪李嘉诚旗下的CK集团在收购英国最大配电网络的重磅交易中采取了不同寻常的做法：全程未聘请任何投行担任财务顾问。【原文：Hong Kong billionaire Victor Li’s CK Group took an unusual approach for the blockbuster sale of the UK’s largest power-distribution network: it didn’t use any investment banks as financial advisers.】

item.title: 日本央行加息，预计2029年利息支出将翻倍
item.description: 日本政府预计，未来四年其未偿债务的利息支出将翻倍，因日本央行逐步加息推高了借贷成本。【原文：The Japanese government expects its interest payments on outstanding debt to roughly double over the next four years as the Bank of Japan’s gradual rate hikes push up borrowing costs.】

item.title: 日本对稀土依赖中国加深 尽管进口量下降
item.description: 尽管日本从全球最大稀土生产国采购的数量有所减少，但上月其对中国的依赖程度仍有所上升。【原文：Japan’s reliance on China for rare earths increased last month, despite a reduction in volumes purchased from the world’s dominant producer.】

item.title: 粘稠的斋月主食为埃及经济注入出口动力
item.description: 棕榈树结出的蜜枣不仅是埃及人本月开斋的热门选择——它们更成为该国力图实现出口驱动型经济复苏的意外助力。【原文：Sticky dates from palm trees aren’t just a popular way for Egyptians to break this month’s Ramadan fast — they’re an unexpected tool in the country’s bid for an export-backed economic revival.】

item.title: 穆迪称南非预算案"证实"强劲财政立场
item.description: 穆迪评级指出，南非最新预算报告描绘了公共财政改善的积极图景，同时警告称实现"实质性"债务削减需要更强劲的经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s latest budget painted an encouraging picture of improving public finances, according to Moody’s Ratings, while cautioning that “meaningful” debt reduction will require stronger economic growth.】

item.title: KKR向银行出售持股价值31亿美元的后交易公司OSTTRA
item.description: KKR & Co.将其旗下交易后服务提供商OSTTRA的少数股权出售给六家银行，这是金融市场基础设施公司最新的一笔此类交易。【原文：KKR & Co. sold a minority stake in its post-trade services provider OSTTRA to six banks, in the latest such deal for a financial-market infrastructure firm.】

item.title: 奥地利第一银行称波兰交易后利息收入将超110亿欧元
item.description: 奥地利第一集团银行表示，在以70亿欧元（83亿美元）收购波兰市场业务后，其今年净利息收入可能超出分析师预期。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG said its net interest income may exceed analyst expectations this year after its €7 billion ($8.3 billion) deal to enter the Polish market.】

item.title: 印度坚持不进口俄罗斯石油，特朗普关税政策存疑
item.description: 印度炼油商正将俄罗斯原油采购量控制在最低水平，此前美国最高法院上周末的裁决使一项备受期待的贸易协议前景蒙上阴影——该协议原本拟以停止进口俄罗斯原油为条件降低关税。【原文：Indian refiners are keeping Russian oil purchases to a minimum after a US Supreme Court ruling at the end of last week threw into question a long-awaited trade deal that would cut tariffs in exchange for halting those imports.】
